title: Miffy: best friends are great
creator_credit: Kodansha, Dick Bruna, Japan Inc, Mercis Media, Yuzuru Otagawa, Yukiko Omura, Yoshimasa Mizou and Toshio Nishiuchi
brief_description: The stories of Miffy and her friends have enchanted and entertained young children for many years. Based on Dick Bruna’s children’s books, this video provides a safe and caring environment where children can discover and explore a wide range of emotions. The following 10 episodes are included: Best friends are great; Miffy’s magnifying glass; Snip with scissors; Who are you?; Like or not?; What’s behind the door?; Hide and seek; Somehow different; Same or different?; Big or small?
